  3. MongoDB

Dependency-free MongoDB management with SnapDB

SnapDB allows you to manage your local MongoDB databases without the need for any additional dependencies. Our tool supports 7 MongoDB versions that you can use without Homebrew, Docker, Vagrant, or any other virtualization software on macOS.

MongoDB is a document database with the scalability and flexibility that you want with the querying and indexing that you need.

Supported MongoDB versions

8.0.4 • macOS 11+ (ARM, 64-bit)

Supported

8.0.4 • macOS 11+ (x86, 64-bit)

Supported

7.0.16 • macOS 11+ (ARM, 64-bit)

Supported

7.0.16 • macOS 11+ (x86, 64-bit)

Supported

6.0.19 • macOS 10+ (ARM, 64-bit)

Supported

6.0.19 • macOS 10+ (x86, 64-bit)

Supported

5.0.30 • macOS 10+ (x86, 64-bit)

Supported
